description: Gets the immediately preceding sibling of the selected element, optionally filtered by a selector.
returns: The immediately preceding siblings of the <ul> elements

description: Gets all preceding sibling of the selected element, optionally filtered by a selector.
returns: All preceding siblings of the <ul> elements

description: Gets all preceding siblings of the selected element up to but not including the element that matches the optional selector, optionally filtered by a filter.
returns: All preceding siblings between <ul> and <h2> elements (exclusive).

description: Gets the immediately following sibling of the selected element, optionally filtered by a selector. If the selector is provided, it will get the immediately following sibling only if it matches the selector.
returns: The immediately following sibling of the <h2> elements if it is a <p> element

description: Gets all following sibling of the selected element, optionally filtered by a selector.
returns: All following siblings of the <h2> elements that are <p> elements

description: Gets all following siblings of the selected element up to but not including the element that matches the optional selector, optionally filtered by a filter.
returns: All following siblings between <h2> and <p> elements (exclusive).

description: Gets all the siblings of the selected element, optionally filtered by a selector.
